Create a linelist object

Source: R/linelist_class.R
as_linelist.Rd

Create a linelist object

as_linelist(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
as_linelist(x, ...)

# S3 method for data.frame
as_linelist(x, ...)

# S3 method for linelist
[(x, i, j, drop = FALSE)

Arguments

x

a data.frame or a linelist object
...

options passed to set_epivars()
i

indicator for rows
j

indicator for columns
drop

indicator for whether the data frame should be dropped if reduced to one column (defaults to FALSE)

See also

get_epivars(), get_dictionary(), list_epivars(), clean_data()

Examples

md <- messy_data(10)
cd <- clean_data(md)
ll <- as_linelist(cd,
                  id = "id",
                  date_onset = "date_of_onset",
                  gender = "gender",
                  geo_lon = "lon",
                  geo_lat = "lat"
                 )
ll
#> <linelist object>
#> 
#>        id date_of_onset  discharge gender epi_case_definition messy_dates
#> 1  uvzwsh    2018-01-06 2018-01-16   male           suspected  2018-10-17
